name: Pin Hockey: Ice Arena
summary: Pin Hockey: Ice Arena is an addictive original hockey game in first person style, so you will play with “inside the field look”, like hockey’s player real view, really different from what you ever seen in other mobile hockey games. It’s easy and intuitive to play and has awesome 3D graphics, lots of teams, and too much fun. Pin Hockey Ice Arena combines a bit of strategy, action and luck to get you a truly nice and unique hockey experience.
